SIGNIN_SOCIAL_MSG: Sign in using your social accounts
SIGNIN_LOCAL_MSG: Or sign in with your local account
SIGNUP_LOCAL_MSG: Or sign up with your local account
INVALID_EMAIL_MSG: This doesn't look like a valid email.
OWASP_MIN_LENGHT: The password must be at least {{owaspValue}} characters long.
OWASP_MAX_LENGHT: The password must be fewer than {{owaspValue}} characters.
OWASP_REPEATED_CHARS: The password may not contain sequences of three or more repeated characters.
OWASP_REQ_LOWERCASE: The password must contain at least one lowercase letter.
OWASP_REQ_UPPERCASE: The password must contain at least one uppercase letter.
OWASP_REQ_NUMBER: The password must contain at least one number.
OWASP_REQ_SPECIAL: The password must contain at least one special character.
